{"type":"text","timestamp":1771656735045,"sessionID":"ses_38107da44ffeMooCCGMkaxeBSF","part":{"id":"prt_c7ef85ea8001q9rkLKErqt59Ph","sessionID":"ses_38107da44ffeMooCCGMkaxeBSF","messageID":"msg_c7ef825fb001GIzMa9vTtrVGld","type":"text","text":"```dockerfile
FROM python:3.11-slim AS builder

LABEL maintainer="team@example.com"
LABEL org.opencontainers.image.description="Python ML inference service with FastAPI"

WORKDIR /app

COPY requirements.txt ./
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir --upgrade pip && \
    pip install --no-cache-dir torch --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu && \
    pip install --no-cache-dir opencv-python-headless numpy scikit-learn uvicorn[standard] fastapi

COPY download_model.py ./
RUN python download_model.py

COPY . .

FROM python:3.11-slim AS production

LABEL maintainer="team@example.com"
LABEL org.opencontainers.image.description="Python ML inference service with FastAPI"

RUN addgroup --system appgroup && adduser --system --ingroup appgroup appuser

WORKDIR /app

COPY --from=builder /app/requirements.txt ./
COPY --from=builder --chown=appuser:appgroup /app/model.pt ./
COPY --from=builder --chown=appuser:appgroup /app/*.py ./

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir --upgrade pip && \
    pip install --no-cache-dir torch --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu && \
    pip install --no-cache-dir opencv-python-headless numpy scikit-learn uvicorn[standard] fastapi && \
    rm -rf /root/.cache/pip

USER appuser

EXPOSE 8000

HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=10s --retries=3 \
    CMD python -c "import urllib.request; urllib.request.urlopen('http://localhost:8000/health').read()" || exit 1

CMD ["uvicorn", "main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "8000"]
```","time":{"start":1771656735045,"end":1771656735045}}}
